name: Poor Choices
description:
In This Game You Follow Jim as He Tries To Leave the Dark Mansion of The Horrible Skelton.  Get Through 10 Challenging Levels and See If You Can Get Both Endings, In This Short Difficult Platformer. Try Your Best To ESCAPE!

This Was A Short Game made For The Spooky 2D Game Jam 2020. 

(The Save and part of the menu Function Is From A Older Project)
